data.title: Gaming in 2023, The First Quarter

data.text:
Holy cow, 17 games completed in three months! NOICE! Of course… also added THIRTY-SIX games so… weee! I also tightened up the formatting so just going to list games acquired during the quarter, versus the running back log. If you want to see the fuller backlog, just check out my HowLongToBeat page.

As always, between these updates, you can watch me stream on Twitch (usually 3x a week), I’ve started posting some Let’s Plays on YouTube as well, and you’re welcome to track what I’m playing as well as see all the games in the backlog over at HowLongToBeat.com!

Actively Playing

Horizon Forbidden West (PS4)

Gas Station Simulator (Steam)

Yakuza 5 (PS4)

Evil West (Steam)

Sons of the Forest (Steam)

Crash Bandicoot 4 (PS4)

Completed

Mate – January 3

Viltnemda – January 7

You Must – January 15

Tall Poppy – February 8

I Won’t Forget Hue – February 11

Locked In Mind – February 11

Resident Evil Village – February 17

PowerWash Simulator: Tomb Raider DLC – February 18

September 7th – February 20

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder’s Revenge – February 24

Fractured Minds – February 25

The Test: Secrets of the Soul – March 3

Uninvited Guest – March 13

Partum Artifex – March 14

PowerWash Simulator: Midgar DLC – March 20

Disney Dreamlight Valley (GamePass PC) – March 24 – through available content as of the completion date

Murder House – April 3

Dropped/Did Not Finish

Siren Head: The Horror Experience – February 18 – death required complete restarting; too frustrating after awhile

God’s Basement – March 19th – bugged puzzle kept from continuing

A Girls Fabric Face – March 23 – bugs kept causing the character to get stuck; no save so had to restart whole game each time

HITMAN World of Assassination (PS4)
